�Hello! This is Escargo Express.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Tracy doesn't work here any more.  Yeah, she used to work here, part-time.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Hunh?  This is [PRINT_STAT NESS_NAME]?[LINE_BREAK]
  Tracy's big brother?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

�It's an honor to talk to you, sir![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

  I'm very sorry.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

�It seems that the citizens of Onett have been harassed[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

�It seems that the citizens of Onett have been harassed[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�by those dang street punks called the Sharks.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�I wonder if going and talking to Frank,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�the leader of the Sharks, would do any good?[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�So, have you met B. H. Pirkle, the mayor of Onett?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Mayor Pirkle's office is on the second floor of Onett City Hall.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Go northwest.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�A traveling entertainer is having some trouble getting into a locked shack...[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�You're on your way to Giant Step, aren't you?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Just be careful, the police are pretty touchy about people,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�not to mention kids, going up there...[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�The police were here looking for you.  Did you do something illegal?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Head south on the street in front of my shop.  You'll find the Onett Police Station.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�I think it's best if you turn yourself in... no matter what you may have done.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Have you heard of a girl named [PRINT_NAME PAULA]?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�She lives in Twoson, the town next to Onett...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�They say she has some pretty spectacular supernatural powers.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You can get to Twoson by heading south.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Have you been to Apple Kid and Orange Kid's houses?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Their places are south of the Polestar Preschool.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�They are great inventors ...to be.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�They need some financial help.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�If you help them ...later,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�for sure,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�without fail,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�certainly,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�something wonderful will happen.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Believe me, this hint is worth a lot more than you paid.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�If you go east from the bus stop,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�you will enter the Peaceful Rest Valley.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�If you keep going east, you will come to Happy Happy Village.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You should maybe go there, unless you have something better to do?[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�You got a call from Apple Kid on your Receiver phone?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�What are you doing here, so far away from his home?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�I can't give you any hints, but I'll keep your $[PRINT_NUM 0].[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Have you spoken to Everdred in Burglin Park?[LINE_BREAK]
[GOSUB L_C7DD4F]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C709AC L_C70974]
; $C70974
L_C70974:
�Well, well, well...  That's not good.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You really should take the time out to meet Everdred.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Well, well, well...  That's not good.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You really should take the time out to meet Everdred.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�What?  You DID talk to him?  So, why are you here?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Go back to the Peaceful Rest Valley.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Have you been to the Happy Happyism headquarters[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�at the center of Happy Happy village?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Do you want to go there?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Or not?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�What?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Why can't you make up your mind![GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Do you remember seeing a litte mountain cabin on the way[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�through the Peaceful Rest Valley?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�There must be a cave in the Happy Happy village that leads to that cabin.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�This is my business, so I'm happy to have customers.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�But, don't you know this is a crisis?[PAUSE 20]  You shouldn't be wasting time here.�Anyway, I'll keep your $[PRINT_NUM 0].[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�You know that [PRINT_NAME PAULA] is in the mountain cabin, right?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�By rescuing her, you actually rescue yourself.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�[PRINT_NAME PAULA]'s father at the Polestar Preschool must be really worried.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You should be considerate of a father's feelings toward his daughter.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�He's only human, y'know![GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Go and see Everdred, the boss of Burglin Park.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Just trust me... you go see him.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�The Runaway Five, the band at the Chaos theater, is up to their eyes in debt.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Could anyone pay off their debt for them?[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�I don't think there is anything else you need to do in this town.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�It's okay of you stay, but it's really okay if you leave...[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�There's a tunnel northwest of this town.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�There are two guard zombies that hang out at the entrance.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�They are actually pretty nice guys...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�It might be a good idea to meet those guys...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�But it's quite all right if you don't...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Though I think that you really ought to go there.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�So, how are you doin', kid?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�If you're tired, you should go to the hotel and rest.[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

�Do you know about that mysterious tent that appeared[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�at the south end of town?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�I don't know, but...[LINE_BREAK]
  it looks kinda...[LINE_BREAK]
  strange...[GOSUB L_C726CB]
[END]

[GOSUB L_C72620]

�There's an underground path northwest of this town.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

�It seems like you don't know what to do in Saturn Valley.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

�a password to get you into the secret base.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

[END]

�Mr. Saturn must have told you to wait for three minutes in front of the waterfall.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�What?  You don't know where the waterfall is?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�The waterfall is actually named Grapefruit Falls.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�After you exit the tunnel that begins in the Threed graveyard,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�go to the north.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�You certainly know about the cave to Saturn Valley that is then on your right.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�But...[LINE_BREAK]
  You should not go in that cave.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
�Keep going straight north.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
